text:
GitHub のリポジトリ、いくつか条件あるけど削除してから 90 日以内ならサポートに連絡しなくても UI から復活できるのね
<https://docs.github.com/en/github/administering-a-repository/restoring-a-deleted-repository>

attachments.fallback: Restoring a deleted repository - GitHub Docs
attachments.title: Restoring a deleted repository - GitHub Docs
attachments.text: You can restore some deleted repositories to recover their contents.
